explanation: [0-0] A left hand holds an inflated purple balloon with a narrower section at the top. The balloon has a smiling face drawn on it with a black marker. A right hand holds a pair of yellow scissors in front of the balloon. There is a golden tray underneath.

[0-4] Then, the purple balloon is cut open, and green sequins fall into the tray. Immediately after, the right hand cuts the purple balloon again with the scissors, causing many green sequins to fall into the tray. Some sequins also land on the hand. The purple balloon deflates rapidly.

[4-10] Subsequently, the scene switches to a left hand holding a red balloon. The red balloon has a calm face drawn on it with a black marker. Then, a right hand cuts the red balloon with a pair of blue scissors. The left hand continuously squeezes the red balloon, and red slime from inside falls into the tray. Subsequently, the red balloon shrinks quickly.
